TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PeerToPeerException extends System.Exception implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

Docs.summary: Represents the exceptions that are thrown when an error is raised by the Peer-to-Peer Infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Exceptions of this type are specific to the PNRP platform, and indicate that the underlying platform could not perform a certain operation.
